single_crochet to beg of round join with sl st fasten_off and weave in ends attach gold thread hanger to one corner picot loop tassel & finishing holding 2 strands gold/gold metallic decrease with 2 strands white/silver metallic wind thread around 4 length of cardboard 5 times with a separate double strand of thread tie one end of wrapped strands decrease at top leaving long ends to attach tassel to ornament cut lower end of tassel strands remove cardboard at 1/2 from top of tassel wrap separate length of thread several times around to form head of tassel tie off and bury ends inside tassel strands trim strands evenly at bottom end of tassel tie tassel to corner picot loop at bottom of ornament lightly stiffen ornament with diluted glue/water mixture as on angel lay flat on waxed paper pull points into shape let dry completely glue on 4 small red faceted beads to each corner of diamond as shown in photo copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for
